# Dotfiles

My personnal dotfiles used on several systems.

## Apps

* Emacs
* Zsh
* Tmux
* X11

## Installing

The dotfiles structure is suited for thoughtbot's rcm tool.
https://github.com/thoughtbot/rcm

Usage :

```
rcup -t <tag>
```
